1.content:

Your friends told you to meet her at the pizza place at 5:30, so you did. You even ordered pizza, but she has yet to show up.

(Dang if being late is a common occurrence than I don't think this relationship will last very long...) you think to yourself.

Suddenly the door opens, and in walks a Slime Girl. She is unlike anything you had ever seen before. (A slime girl...that a completelycommon occurrence...) you lie to yourself.

Suddenly the slime girl looks at you and smiles. She begins to approach you...

What color is she?

Red: Red slime girls are typically fiery, and can be quite hyper.
Blue: Blue slime girls are calm and collected, and can sometimes be quite shy.
Green: Green slime girls can become very clingy and attached emotionally

1551.content:
Looks like your date is here, and as it turned out that she was not what you expected to see. A white-colored slime girl, with quite the body too, but the thought didn't last long since she was transparent. You began to lose your sense of reality as your mind began to drift off thinking of the numerous puzzling questions, such as....how in the world did your friends set this up?

"Um, excuse me?" You heard someone speaking to you and snapped you back into reality.

You look towards the white slime girl talking as she looks at you with a small smile. "You are the one I'm going on a date with right? My name is Chloe." The slime girl spoke with a friendly tone of voice. Her voice sounded almost angelic as if she were an angel with a soft voice that felt made her seem pure and untainted.

You nodded your head and thought, 'Well she has one beautiful figure, and it seems like she's a nice girl. I'll give her a shot, definitely better than not having a date show up at all, or worse.'

You then stuck your hand out ready to shake her hand and introduced yourself, "Hi I'm Tom, nice to meet you Chloe."You replied with a smile.

Chloe then reached out with her hand and shook your hand, her slimey hand felt slick and warm. The slimey hand began to ooze around your hand and slowly pulled on it trying to drag you inside her, but before you could pull away Chloe retracts her hand and took the empty seat in front of you.

"I'm sorry Tom, but my body does that naturally when I'm hungry" The white slime girl apologized, it seems like she was embarrassed after that happened, her cheeks seemed to be slightly...red? As you noticed the slight change in color, it seemed a little odd considering she was entirely made of white slime. "It's ok Chloe, if your hungry I got us some pizza." You replied, Chloe was a good girl no doubt about it, but you felt a little uneasy whether or not the date will go well or not.

"Oh wow thanks!" Chloe replied as she grabbed the pizza on the table and was about to shove the whole thing in her mouth, but then she hesitated. "Oh I'm sorry this pizza was for us to share, my bad. How many slices did you want Tom?" She giggled nervously.

"I'll take two slices Chloe." You replied looking at the slime's behavior. 'At least she took me into consideration before she ate the whole thing.' You thought.

After getting your two slices of pizza, Chloe began to the eat the rest of the pizza...in one gulp. As you started to eat your pizza, you couldn't help but look at the pizza just floating inside her body where the stomach would be as it began to dissolve away, turning into a gooey white substance just like the rest of her body.

"Mmmm, that was some good pizza. Thank you." Chloe said as she licked her lips emphasizing how much she liked it. "How is your pizza Tom?"

"Yeah the pizza is pretty good Chloe." You said as you took another bite.

After some small chit chat, you finished your pizza and both you and Chloe are ready to leave.

Chloe began to speak as she got up from her seat, "Hmmm Tom, what are we gonna do next?"

Looks like the date isn't over yet.
1551.title: The abnormal date and the white slime girl...

15512.content:
"Well how about we take a walk through the park?" You suggested.

"Alright sure I'm fine with that, plus I'll become more familiar with the city. I'm kinda new here." Chloe replied with a cheerful smile.

"Ok then it's settled. Let's go Chloe." You said as the both of you leave the pizza restaurant, heading towards the direction of the park. Along the way Chloe scanned the area around her as she looks around for anything that would catch her attention. It seems like Chloe didn't attract as much attention as you thought she would, but then again the sidewalks and the streets were almost empty.

Nonetheless you push the thought away, you wanted to enjoy the date with Chloe and maybe spend the rest of the day together. You and Chloe soon arrive at the park, which also appeared to lack the citizens of the area.

"Looks like we are here. The park." You said as you and Chloe walked along the path in the park.

"This place seems nice, it seems very calm." Chloe commented, though that might be due to the fact that there were hardly any people around. The thought kept nagging at you at the dismissed it once more.

"I wouldn't say that this place is always calm, it just so happens that today was uneventful I guess. Nothing unexpected that would surprise us" you said, though you would admit that it would be nice to having such a calm environment, which is unlikely to be found in a city.

After taking a walk through the park, it was getting pretty dark. Time flies when your enjoying yourself. Even so, you would like to spend some more time with Chloe, but at this point it would be best to stay indoors.

info.brief_description: A reboot of the "Your Slime Girl Lover" story that was deleted nearly a year ago.
info.description:
Welcome to the Reboot of the "Your Slime Girl Lover" interactive.

I was very sad that the original story was deleted, so I took it upon myself to re-create the story and try to get it as popular as the original one!


Rules:
-All types of vore are allowed, but the story doesn't have to be centered around it
-No one dies! Please do not kill of any characters.
-Unbirth is allowed in this reboot, as it was not in the original.
-please use proper grammar when contributing to the story, this includes quotes.

Characters:
-The main character's name is Tom. He is a 21 year old who has never encountered Slime Girls before.
-The slime Girl's name is Chloe. (This is from the original story.
- list will be expanded as more characters are added

If you have any questions or suggestions, please take the time to message me!
I may edit some chapters to better suit the story flow.
I will award up to 1000 GPs for good adds!
Special Deal: Consecutive addition bonus The more you add, the more GPs you get!
